name: HomeRush
description:
You house is a mess and you need to clean it, you and your friend are competiting to find the item first and put it in the chest at the center of the house. 

The one that scores the most win.

Playable with the keyboard in local.

A game made during the Global Game Jam 2021 (2 days) the thematic was "lost and found".

Artists : Yannis CLOAREC (Yann2bis) - Maxime MICHON (Weirddreamer)  - Alexandre LAVAUD (RyoMega) - Léa LAMOLIE (Pullmoche)

Dev : Arthur GICQUEL (AZZ) - RyoMega

Sound : Pullmoche
